mapper.insert: insert into review(bookId, memberId, content, rating) values (#{bookId}, #{memberId}, #{content}, #{rating})
mapper.select: select reviewId from review where memberId = #{memberId} and bookId = #{bookId}
select count(*) from review where bookId = #{bookId}
mapper.update: update review set content = #{content}, rating = #{rating} where reviewId = #{reviewId}
